xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/51523-Ek Khiladi Ek Haseena 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/fSna2ZOx8f6YUve6Hwu4cIDf8Nw.jpg A career criminal tries to disprove the old adage that "you can't con a con man" in this Bollywood drama. Arjun is a confidence man who, after the death of one of his best friends, decides to pull a major scam to punish the killer. However, the plan goes awry, and he finds himself deep in debt to two of his partners, gangster Sikander and hitman Kaif. In order to even the score and save his own skin, Arjun is forced to plan an even bigger con, with one of India's most powerful crime figures, Jehanghir Khan, as the target. Helping Arjun pull off the scam of a lifetime are his friends and cohorts Bhatia, a master forger; Jack, an all-purpose swindler; and Natasha, a beautiful psychiatrist whose passion for the nooks and crannies of the human mind had caused her to fall for Arjun. Ek Khiladi Ek Haseena
